pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Estimation of the Evolutionary Rate Matrix // Estimates the evolutionary rate matrix (R) using Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) as described in Caetano and Harmon (2017) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12826. The package has functions to run MCMC chains, plot results, evaluate convergence, and summarize posterior distributions.
